page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: As much of the area belongs to{ {Warrington New Town Development,} industry in the area is likely to develop dramatically over the next few years. One{industrial area,}already developed and in operation, is that known as{Winwick Quay.}Although there are a few large units there is also an area known as{Craven Court}which is specifically for small, possibly new ventures. The range of businesses on site include{manufacturing, service indus- {tries}and{distribution.}In a survey conducted it was found that over{75% were{new businesses}and the majority look forward to{expansion}in the near future. Many firms were impressed with the{communications}such as {motorway networks, rail}and{airport links all within 25 minutes drive.
